name: Newton
headline: AI-powered phone platform for dentists
description: Newton is an AI-powered phone system (VoIP) system for dentists and dental groups.

founders.name: Sam Detjen, Founder
founders.description: Ex microsoft engineer and first time founder

Build and maintain your patient base
Grow your practice steadily with our smart patient acquisition and retention tools. We help you attract new patients while keeping your existing ones coming back.
Keep tomorrow's chairs full
Newton works around the clock to prevent no-shows and instantly fill cancellations, keeping your chairs filled and your days productive 
Let the front desk focus on patient care
We offload the manual and repetitive work from your front desk, allowing them to focus on what matters the most — your patients

### Measurable results
### Measurable results
Track your ROI in real time: monitor new bookings, handled calls, and increased production
Track your ROI in real time: monitor new bookings, handled calls, and increased production
Features
**24/7 Phone & Text Support**Sophia's around-the-clock availability means no more missed or dropped calls. She handles calls on her own or escalates to staff with context when needed.
Appointment Management 
Sophia monitors arrivals over phone and text. She seamlessly reschedules patients that can’t make their appointment and manages a waitlist in real-time to keep chairs full.
**Targeted Patient Engagement** Customers use Newton to build custom patient lists based on appointments, treatments, and insurance—and launch AI-powered campaigns to boost reactivation.
**Online AI Chat & Forms**Customers can embed Newton's AI on their website to streamline patient acquisition—automatically collecting insurance and intake details from start to finish.

Phone system
Voice AI

New patient acquisition (forms, online scheduling)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Newton**

Founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, Newton has burst onto the scene as an innovative player in the dental tech landscape. This company, which is part of Y Combinator’s Batch W24, is dedicated to transforming how dental practices manage patient interactions through its AI-powered phone platform. You can learn more about their offering at [joinnewton.com](https://joinnewton.com).

**Mission and Services**

Newton's mission is straightforward yet powerful: to create an AI-driven phone system that streamlines operations for dentists and dental service organizations (DSOs). Their platform, cleverly named "Sophia," isn't just a VoIP service; it's designed to integrate deeply into dental workflows to help practices automate appointment bookings, minimize missed calls, and drive overall practice growth.

Here’s what makes Newton special:

- **24/7 Voice AI**: Say goodbye to missed calls. Newton’s AI handles calls around the clock, ensuring no patient inquiry goes unanswered.
- **Automated Appointment Management**: Sophia actively books, reschedules, and manages appointments, which can significantly improve patient satisfaction and chair utilization.
- **Revenue Boost**: Practices reportedly generate an average of $50,000 in additional monthly revenue thanks to increased appointment bookings and better patient reactivation strategies.
